member.name: M:Kofba.Framework.UI.Repository.RepositoryController.InitializeStructure
member.summary: Creates the elementhal structure into database if needed.

member.name: M:Kofba.Framework.UI.Repository.RepositoryController.VerifyDatabaseStructure
member.summary: Checks database searching for tables RepositoryRecord and RepositoryRecordCache.
member.returns: Returns False if needs to reconstruct.

member.name: M:Kofba.Framework.UI.Repository.RepositoryController.LoadByKey(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get the full RepositoryRecord object from his unique identifier.
member.returns: A single object that includes the 'Content' property. This is the only method that returns all the file content.

member.name: M:Kofba.Framework.UI.Repository.RepositoryController.LoadById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Search all items from a group. Must use LoadByKey() to get the 'Content' property. This method only applies for commited files.
member.returns: All repository files from the group id, except the property 'Content'

member.name: M:Kofba.Framework.UI.UsageStatistics.UsageController.InitializeStructure
member.summary: Creates the elementhal structure into database if needed.

member.name: M:Kofba.Framework.UI.UsageStatistics.UsageController.VerifyDatabaseStructure
member.summary: Checks database searching for table Usage and RepositoryRecordCache.
member.returns: Returns False if needs to reconstruct.
